plot outline: Ghanteshwar is a 40-year-old simple and naive unmarried man who harbors dreams of marrying the girl of his dream. So committed he is to the future partner that he is yet to make love with any woman. It also doesn't help that he doesn't fall into the conventional definition of male beauty. He is middle-aged, large in size, has ordinary looks, lacks self-confidence, and is too gullible for this ruthless world. When his friend convinces him to approach a doctor for his lack of interest in sex, the doctor warns him to either have an active sex life or he would never be able to keep his wife happy and satisfied. This greatly disturbs him and following his friend's advice, he decides to explore sex through any means possible. What follows is a heartening and hilarious tale of him discovering one of the biggest stigmas in our society and the lessons he learns along the way. Watch this endearing tale of Ghanteshwar that promises to leave you rooting for him.
title: Urf Ghanta
plot: A warm, fuzzy and endearing story of naive Ghanteshwar, a middle-aged unmarried guy, who dreams of getting married one day to the girl of his dreams, but his world is turned upside down when he learns a startling truth about himself.

Ghanteshwar is a 40-year-old simple and naive unmarried man who harbors dreams of marrying the girl of his dream. So committed he is to the future partner that he is yet to make love with any woman. It also doesn't help that he doesn't fall into the conventional definition of male beauty. He is middle-aged, large in size, has ordinary looks, lacks self-confidence, and is too gullible for this ruthless world. When his friend convinces him to approach a doctor for his lack of interest in sex, the doctor warns him to either have an active sex life or he would never be able to keep his wife happy and satisfied. This greatly disturbs him and following his friend's advice, he decides to explore sex through any means possible. What follows is a heartening and hilarious tale of him discovering one of the biggest stigmas in our society and the lessons he learns along the way. Watch this endearing tale of Ghanteshwar that promises to leave you rooting for him.
